name: OF SUFFERING AND DESPAIR
description:
"It's a brilliant sunny day
But dark clouds are hanging above me
The body is healthy
But the pain in this chest
Has only grown more intense

What I once had seems so far away
Dreams crushed, heart broken
Alone and miserable
Sorrows so deep I just want to disappear

The foods are tasteless
The colors are dull
The sound bleak and far away
I can't feel anything but despair

Do we say goodbye?

It's a bloody battlefield inside
The battle between good and evil
The winner gets to decide
Whether to pull the trigger
Or live to struggle for another day

I want to live for another day"
